text: @cdollar67 So, assholes such as yourself, trolling on multiple posts of mine?
@taylorbear1983 fair enough, that’s a good response g

@louis__davis you’re back!  We missed you!  I tried to tag you in my comment but it couldn’t find you (maybe because we are strangers 🤪). Don’t be mad at us, Heather is a good friend of mine from high school, and we’ve been through a lot.  I know that she has a lot of valuable life experience to share about masculinity in our society, from a lot of positive and negative experiences.  My whole thing is: get the facts about someone before you criticize them, and that we as men need to be accountable for ourselves and for each other.  I get why people are upset with the ad, but I disagree with that argument.  No, not all men are pigs.  But the men who are pigs are causing a shit ton of problems in our world.  We, as good men (I hope I can count on you as one!), need to stand up and say, “Masculinity is about respect.  It’s about kindness.  It’s about defending people who struggle.  It’s about serving people who need help.  Real manliness is about being a good guy, an honest guy, an honorable guy.” That’s what I feel Gillette is trying to say, that men are the best when they are strong, respectful, standing up for what’s good, and being a man of integrity.

@taylorbear1983 Eh, he started whinging about how he's just a 16 year old kid and it wasn't really toxic masculinity if he's a child (he literally used the word child. What 16 yo does that?) You didn't miss much. I almost feel bad for him. . . Almost. 😉 Hope you guys are doing well!
@heathernjblue I think I missed the argument, I only see your comments.  Sorry to Louis, I had a life to live today 🤪 (and apparently he blocked me, so, whatever you said worked 👍🏽)
Lol fucking lgbt cunts running away from the truth
@louis__davis Okay then. Glad you've come to realize you're guilty of harassment. Thanks again for providing me with a perfect visual aid for my presentation. Byeee!
@louis__davis so coming to a complete stranger and calling them dumb is. . . What exactly?
@louis__davis sweetie, if you're old enough to be harassing a complete stranger, you're old enough to be accountable for it. 😉

@louis__davis Oh this is gold! I'm helping prepare a workshop on toxic masculinity (which will be given to a fortune 500 company that has offices locally) and this thread has been screenshot and converted into a power point and included in the printed pamphlet to be handed out to roughly 10,000 employees. Congratulations, Louis! You're about to be the poster boy for toxic masculinity!

@louis__davis Really, do I need to explain?  You’re trolling by picking an argument with a total stranger.  Who am I to you?  Nobody.  I don’t know you.  You come on to my IG feed, criticize me (“are you dumb”), and then ask me how you are trolling me after I call you out for it?  You have know idea if I’m dumb or not because you have no clue who I am.  You don’t know what I know about this Gillette ad or not.  You don’t know what I know about toxic masculinity or not.  You don’t know what any of my views about this subject are.  You have no clue who I am.  If you want to have a more nuanced discussion about this, you can get to know me first.  Don’t come on my feed, insult me, and then feign that you don’t know how you are trolling me.  Find out what I know and think about this before you make your judgements about me.
@____o0f Poor you and your fragile man-ego 🙄

I love how I never get more attention than from my own followers, yet over this minor issue of the Gillette ad, I have now two fragile men attacking me, a total stranger.  Man, either Russian bots, or extremely insecure men who have nothing better to do than troll strangers @louis__davis @____o0f
